kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1 path_url=/posts/1 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
